channel.title: Need help with npc forchat!
channel.description:
Hello guys, i was wondering what the code is for making an NPC Talk. Kinda like making a Player Talk Like force chat. an Example:
p.chatText = "Example";
Witch makes a Player talk by Force. I need help on doing this with a NPC, for when i click on an Object or just on it's own, an Npc would come out and say somthing. (Alls i need help is with the Npc Fore Chat.)

item.title: Need help with npc forchat!

item.description:
@usernam62618 wrote:

Hello guys, i was wondering what the code is for making an NPC Talk.

Kinda like making a Player Talk Like force chat.

an Example:

Witch makes a Player talk by Force.

I need help on doing this with a NPC, for when i click on an Object or just on it’s own, an Npc would come out and say somthing. (Alls i need help is with the Npc Fore Chat.)
